overall_perception_summary.headline: Precision Barrier Recovery
overall_perception_summary.description: Dr. Althea acts as a clinical architect for compromised skin, stripping away marketing fluff to focus entirely on 'Relief' and 'Recovery.' It differentiates through a stark Pharma-Code aesthetic and radical ingredient transparency ('345 philosophy'), positioning itself as a medical-grade tool for the educated consumer. It plays the role of the sterile, reliable expert who fixes post-acne damage with laboratory precision.

foundation.title: The Clinical Healer
foundation.description: The brand adopts The Healer stance, deriving authority from the 'Korea Institute of Dermatological Sciences' to treat skin issues as pathologies ('Post-acne', 'Blemish'). It operates on a Safety First value system, prioritizing 'Hypoallergenic' tolerance over aggressive potency. This creates a Medical Authority positioning where the product is a utility for health, not a luxury for vanity.

identity.title: The Sterile Expert
identity.description: The relationship is defined by The Reliable Expert territory—distant, competent, and devoid of emotion. Dominated by The Caregiver archetype (60%) framed through a Sage lens (30%), it uses a Pharma-Code visual identity (stark black/white/green) to signal absolute control. The Tone of Voice is Clinical Authority: grave, data-driven, and focused on verifying truth.

communication.title: The Problem Solver
communication.description: Messaging hooks the user with 'Relief' and 'Recovery,' acting as The Problem Solver for specific conditions. The narrative is a Lab Breakthrough story, citing 'Clinical Trials' and 'Institutes' as the protagonist. It uses Derm-Validation as its primary proof, educating the user through 'The Textbook' focus on ingredient percentages and diagrams.

benefits.title: Restorative Purity
benefits.description: Functionally, it delivers Restoration, repairing the barrier and soothing irritation. Emotionally, it provides Relief/Safety, removing the anxiety of reactions for sensitive skin sufferers. Socially, it is a badge for The Purist—signaling an ethical, educated choice ('Vegan', 'FSC', 'Soy Ink') that rejects mass-market noise.

marker_1.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] ORIGIN OF AUTHORITY (The Source of Power)
marker_1.reasoning: The brand derives power from the 'Korea Institute of Dermatological Sciences' and 'Clinical Trial Completed' stamps, firmly anchoring it in white-coat validation (Origin: 2/5 Derm-Validated). The mission is explicit in the name 'Relief Cream' and claims like 'Post-acne recovery' and 'Soothing'—it is fixing damage, not enhancing glow (Mission: 2/5 Restoration).
marker_1.evidence: Korea Institute of Dermatological Sciences... CLINICAL TRIAL COMPLETED... Post-acne recovery... Skin Soothing TESTED

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Derm) + Slider B (2/5 Restoration) match typical pattern for Territory 1 - The Healer. Clinical origin + repair mission aligns with pathology-focused content.

marker_2.slider_b_position_name: ▼ Approachable (Easy to find, easy to buy)
marker_2.reasoning: The scope is laser-focused on 'Post-acne marks' and 'Blemish care'—a micro-correction of specific skin faults (Scope: 1/5). However, the presentation through 'seamless inclusion in daily routines' and broad distribution (Amazon) suggests it is democratic 'Relief' rather than elite gatekeeping (Access: 4/5). It democratizes clinical recovery.
marker_2.evidence: Optimized for post-acne recovery... Blemish... seamless inclusion in daily routines... Dermatologist-inspired

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Micro-Correction) + Slider B (4/5 Approachable) match typical pattern for Territory 1 - The Democratizers. Pathology focus + accessible framing aligns with accessible health content.

marker_3.reasoning: The PDP prioritizes safety over aggression. Claims like 'Suitability for Acne-prone Skin... TESTED' and 'Skin Irritation Tested' prove the 'Do No Harm' ethos (Performance: 2/5 Gentle). Transparency is high but clinical—'Transparent ingredient listing,' '3-4-5 ingredient philosophy'—using data to prove safety (Transparency: 2/5 Evidence-First).
marker_3.evidence: Suitability for Acne-prone Skin (Non-comedogenic) TESTED... Skin Irritation Tested For Sensitive Skin... Transparent ingredient listing

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Gentle) + Slider B (2/5 Evidence-First) match typical pattern for Territory 1 - Safety First. Gentle priority + data-heavy transparency aligns with safe harbor content.

marker_4.reasoning: The visual code is 'Stark black on white,' 'minimalist,' and 'pharmacy-inspired'—totally sterile (Aesthetic: 1/5). The value perception is utilitarian—a 'Relief Cream' in a squeeze tube that is 'lightweight' for 'daily routines.' It doesn't signal luxury status; it signals the pharmacy shelf (Value: 2/5 Daily Essential).
marker_4.evidence: Stark black on white... clinical, pharmaceutical authority... squeeze tube... Daily routines

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Sterile) + Slider B (2/5 Utility/Essential) match typical pattern for Territory 1 - The Medical Authority. Sterile aesthetic + functional utility aligns with pharmacy positioning.

marker_5.reasoning: There is zero warmth here. The language is 'Clinical Trial,' 'Verified,' and '3-4-5 philosophy.' It is distant and professional (Warmth: 1/5). The authority is high—'Dr. Althea,' 'Institute,' 'Dermatologist Tested'—positioning the brand as a serious specialist (Authority: 4/5).
marker_5.evidence: Clinical Trial Completed... Verified by a professional dermatological institute... Dr. Althea... 345 philosophy

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Robotic) + Slider B (4/5 Specialist) match typical pattern for Territory 3 - The Reliable Expert. Low warmth + high authority aligns with competent/distant content.

marker_6.reasoning: The core promise is protection and relief ('Relief Cream,' 'Soothing,' 'Safe for sensitive skin')—classic Caregiver energy (60%). This is supported by The Sage (30%) which provides the 'Transparent ingredient listing' and 'Clinical Trial' proof. A dash of The Innocent (10%) appears via 'Vegan,' 'Clean,' and 'Soy Ink' claims, but the dominant energy is protective science.
marker_6.evidence: Relief Cream... Soothing protection... Clinical Trial Completed... Transparent ingredient listing... Vegan... Soy Ink

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Marker 6 uses percentage distribution. Territory 4 (The Guardian) is selected due to Caregiver dominance.

marker_7.reasoning: The tone is grave and dry. 'Skin Irritation Tested,' '177% immediate boost,' 'EE023.' No jokes, no exclamation marks, no slang. It speaks the language of a lab report (Humor 1/5, Enthusiasm 2/5), creating a Clinical Authority voice that builds trust through data, not hype.
marker_7.evidence: Skin Irritation Tested... 177% immediate boost... EE023... Suitability for Acne-prone Skin

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Humor (1/5) + Enthusiasm (2/5) meets the hard rule for Territory 1 - The Clinical Authority. The content is devoid of emotion and highly technical.

marker_8.reasoning: The visual temperature is icy—'Stark black on white,' 'pale sage green,' and 'cool' tones dominate (Thermostat: 1/5). The layout is rigid and informational, using 'Vertical ingredient breakdown,' 'linear grid,' and 'Infographic' styles to convey control (Entropy: 1/5). This is the visual code of the pharmacy.
marker_8.evidence: Stark black on white... High-contrast monochromatic palette... Vertical ingredient breakdown... Linear grid... Pale sage green
marker_8.look_and_feel: A stark, minimalist clinical aesthetic using high-contrast typography and infographics to signal medical precision.
marker_8.primary_palette: Clinical white and black base with accents of pale sage green and soft medical yellow.

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Sterile) + Slider B (1/5 Swiss Grid) match typical pattern for Territory 1 - Pharma-Code. Clinical sterility + rigid control aligns with pharmacy visual content.

marker_9.reasoning: The hook is the result: 'Relief,' 'Post-acne recovery,' 'Blemish care' (Hook: 4/5 Result). The persuasion is pure data: '177% immediate boost,' 'Clinical Trial Completed,' 'Non-comedogenic TESTED' (Persuasion: 1/5 Raw Data). It identifies the problem (Acne/Sensitivity) and solves it with numbers.
marker_9.evidence: Relief Cream... Post-acne recovery... 177% immediate boost... Suitability for Acne-prone Skin... TESTED

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (4/5 Result) + Slider B (1/5 Raw Data) match typical pattern for Territory 2 - The Problem Solver. Result-focused hook + data-driven persuasion aligns with functional resolution content.

marker_10.reasoning: The hero is the 'Korea Institute of Dermatological Sciences' and the 'Dr.' persona (Protagonist: 1/5). The setting is explicitly a place of testing—'Clinical Trial Completed,' 'Verified by institute' (Setting: 1/5 Lab). There is no founder story or garden origin; there is only the institution.
marker_10.evidence: Korea Institute of Dermatological Sciences... Clinical Trial Completed... Verified by a professional dermatological institute

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Nobel) + Slider B (1/5 Lab) match typical pattern for Territory 1 - The Lab Breakthrough. Institutional protagonist + lab setting aligns with scientific validation content.

marker_11.slider_b_position_name: ▼ The Stat ('95% saw reduction', numerical proof)
marker_11.reasoning: Validation comes from 'The Board'—the 'Korea Institute' and 'Dermatologist Tested' seals (Validator: 1/5). The truth is represented by 'The Stat' ('177% boost') and 'The Graph' (infographics of testing). It relies on expertise and numbers.
marker_11.evidence: Dermatologist Tested... Korea Institute of Dermatological Sciences... 177% immediate boost... CLINICAL TRIAL COMPLETED

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Board) + Slider B (2/5 Stat) match typical pattern for Territory 1 - Derm-Validation. Expert validator + statistical proof aligns with clinical authority content.

marker_12.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] THE OWNERSHIP CLAIM (What Makes You Unique)
marker_12.slider_b_position_name: ▼ The Problem Solver (Targets specific skin concern)
marker_12.reasoning: The USP is anchored in the '345' concept—a specific, proprietary-sounding ingredient philosophy (Signature Complex: 3/5). The scope is narrowed to 'Post-acne recovery' and 'Acne-prone skin'—it's not for everyone; it's for people with a problem (Scope: 4/5). This makes it The Specialist.
marker_12.evidence: 345 ingredient philosophy... Post-acne recovery... Suitability for Acne-prone Skin... Blemish care

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (3/5 Complex) + Slider B (4/5 Problem Solver) match typical pattern for Territory 4 - The Specialist. Proprietary complex + niche focus aligns with specialist positioning.

marker_13.reasoning: The visual strategy is heavy on education. Images are 'Infographics,' 'Ingredient Focus,' and 'Packaging Shots' with dense text (Depth: 1/5 Textbook). The intent is to prove the thesis of efficacy via 'Clinical Trial' stamps and 'verified results' (Intent: 1/5 Thesis).
marker_13.evidence: Infographic... Ingredient Focus... Text density: heavy... Clinical Trial Completed... Verified results

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Textbook) + Slider B (1/5 Thesis) match typical pattern for Territory 1 - Science Education. Educational depth + trust intent aligns with mechanism-focused content.

marker_14.reasoning: The mechanism is 'Relief' and 'Soothing'—it is active repair for 'irritated' or 'acne-prone' skin (Action: 4/5 Healer). The outcome is biological health ('strengthens skin barrier,' 'non-comedogenic'), not a cosmetic filter effect (Outcome: 1/5 Biological).
marker_14.evidence: Skin Soothing TESTED... Relief Cream... strengthens the skin barrier... Post-acne recovery

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (4/5 Healer) + Slider B (1/5 Biological) match typical pattern for Territory 1 - Restoration. Repair action + biological goal aligns with recovery-focused content.

marker_15.slider_a_position_name: ▼ Panic Mode (Urgent need to stop pain/itch)
marker_15.slider_b_position_name: ▼ Sanctuary (I feel safe inside my own body)
marker_15.reasoning: The product targets the anxiety of 'Sensitive' and 'Acne-prone' skin—it offers the 'Relief' of knowing you won't break out (Anxiety: 1/5). The benefit is internal safety—'Skin Irritation Tested,' 'Safe for sensitive skin'—providing a sanctuary from reactions (Self-Perception: 1/5).
marker_15.evidence: Skin Irritation Tested For Sensitive Skin... Relief Cream... Safe for sensitive skin

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Panic/Relief) + Slider B (1/5 Sanctuary) match typical pattern for Territory 1 - Relief / Safety. Relief focus + internal safety aligns with reassurance content.

marker_16.slider_a_position_name: ▼ The Smart Choice (because it makes sense)
marker_16.reasoning: Purchasing this is a vote for ethics and intellect. The 'Vegan,' 'Soy Ink,' and 'FSC' certifications signal a Purist identity—someone who cares about the details. It's a Smart Choice (2/5) driven by a Curated (3/5) appreciation for 'clean and ethical' formulations.
marker_16.evidence: Vegan... PRINTED WITH SOY INK... FSC Certification... Clean and ethical formula

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Smart Choice) + Slider B (3/5 Curated) combined with ethical/clean evidence matches Territory 3 - The Purist. Rational choice + niche ethical appreciation aligns with purist identity.

marker_17.reasoning: This isn't for the average shopper; it's for the 'skintellectual' who knows what 'Ceramide NP' and '345 philosophy' mean. It offers membership in The Knowledge Club—the group that reads the ingredient list and checks for the 'Institute' seal. It signals smarts, not just safety.
marker_17.evidence: Transparent ingredient listing... 345 ingredient philosophy... Korea Institute... Ceramide NP

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (4/5 Distinction) + Slider B (4/5 Club) match typical pattern for Territory 2 - The Knowledge Club. Intellectual distinction + enthusiast tribe aligns with insider/expert content.
